name: Torch And Turret
description:
A "Defend The Castle" type of game with a twist! The twist being the torch you carry around,  you need this torch to light up the enemies for the turret to be able to locate and shoot the ememies!

made for the Brackeys Game Jam!

The theme for the game jam was: Light

I am aware of most of the obvious bugs that i didn't have time to fix :)

Programming by me: AntoN

Art & Animation: _aar0n.exe

Music: Auryn Holmes
